sceneDescription.title: Petronius in Private Thermae at Dawn

setting.time: 64 AD, early morning, first hour after sunrise
setting.location: Public thermae complex, main caldarium chamber
setting.weather: Cool morning air meeting warm steam, creating misty atmosphere

characters.appearance: Gaius Petronius, elegant man in his forties, refined patrician features, perfectly groomed graying hair
characters.clothing: Finest linen bath wrap, gold rings on fingers, expensive perfumed oils nearby
characters.position: Standing at edge of private heated pool in his luxurious villa
characters.action: Contemplating philosophy and aesthetics while preparing for morning bath, embodying refined Roman culture

scene.mainElements: Large heated pool with steam rising from surface, arched stone architecture, bronze heating pipes visible along walls
scene.details: Thick steam clouds catching early sunlight streaming through high windows, marble steps descending into water, bronze oil strigils hanging from hooks, folded linens on stone benches, water drops condensing on stone walls, oil lamps reflecting in pool surface
scene.background: Vaulted ceiling with circular windows, hypocaust heating system pipes, distant doorways leading to other bath chambers
scene.atmosphere: Warm humid air thick with expensive perfumed steam, luxury and refinement contrasting with growing darkness in empire, meditative quiet where arbiter of elegance contemplates beauty and decay

composition.cameraAngle: Low angle from pool level looking up at figure
composition.focus: Steam-shrouded figure backlit by window light
composition.depth: Foreground steaming water surface, middle ground figure in mist, background arched architecture fading into steam
